description: This file defines the 'MethodResolver' interface, which provides method signatures for resolving and executing methods on objects and strings within a substitution engine. It includes support checks, argument retrieval, and execution methods, facilitating dynamic method invocation in the context of substitution.

classes.name: MethodResolver
classes.description: Interface for resolving and executing methods dynamically on objects or strings for the substitution engine.

methods.name: supportsMethod
methods.description: Checks if the resolver supports a given method name for the specified target class.

methods.name: getArgCount
methods.description: Returns the number of arguments required or supported by a method.

methods.name: executeMethod (String target, ...)
methods.description: Executes a method by name on a String target with optional arguments.

methods.name: executeMethod (Object target, ...)
methods.description: Executes a method by name on an Object target with optional arguments.
